events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Support agent Alex has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund for your order.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received that is incorrect?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing the item I received differs from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email within 24 hours.
Thanks for the prompt response! I appreciate the quick handling of my refund request.
The refund has been completed successfully. Please check your bank account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to make sure you received the refund and everything is satisfactory. Let us know if you need further assistance.
As there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a brief survey to rate your support experience. Your feedback helps us improve.
